area module¶

area.area_circle(r)¶

Area of circle.

Calculate the area of a circle based on the radius.

Parameters

r (float) – radius of circle

Returns

area of circle

Return type

float

area.area_square(l)¶

Calculates the area of a square.

Calculates the area of a square based on the lenth of side.

Parameters

l (float) – l is the length of side of a square.

Returns

area of a square.

Return type

float

Area and Circumference of square + circle
